com.objetdirect.tatami.client
Interface HasDojo

All Known Subinterfaces:
DojoPanel
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContentPanel, AbstractDataStore, AbstractDojo, AbstractDojoComplexPane, AbstractDojoComplexPanel, AbstractDojoFocus, BasePicker, BorderContainer, Button, Chart2D, ColorChooser, ColorPicker, ContentPanel, DatePicker, DefaultDataStore, DojoContentPane, DropdownContainer, DropdownDatePicker, DropdownTimePicker, FishEye, Grid, GridDataStore, Legend, NumberSpinner, RuleLabels, RuleMark, Slider, TimePicker, Toaster, Tree
public interface HasDojo

This interface describes a GWT widget integrating a Dojo widget. To do this you need to know :

  • the name of the Dojo
  • How create the widget : parameters...
  • How if you need to create, load some objets before the creation of the dojo widget

Author:
Vianney

Method Summary
 void createDojoWidget()
          Creates the widget Dojo using JSNI for the most of the cases.
 void doAfterCreation()
          Do something after that the widget Dojo is created.
 void doBeforeDestruction()
          Do something before the desctruction of the Dojo widget, use this method to free some memory tp prevent memory leak.
 void free()
          Free,turn to null the resource taken by the Dojo widget in the GWT widget.
 java.lang.String getDojoName()
          Returns the name of the dojo widget example : FisheyeList This method is used to load the scripts JavaScript for Dojo and create the dojo widget.
 com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject getDojoWidget()
          Returns the Dojo widget
 void onDojoLoad()
          This method executes the Java instrcutions or JavaScript (with JSNI ).
 

Method Detail

getDojoWidget

com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject getDojoWidget()
Returns the Dojo widget

Returns:
a JavaScript Object corresponding to the widget Dojo.

createDojoWidget

void createDojoWidget()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Creates the widget Dojo using JSNI for the most of the cases. This method is not to be executed directly in your widget GWT, a controller has to execute it.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the dojo widget can't be created. Warning, check the parameters and their type of JavaScript objects when JSNI is used. A JavaScript error can cause a fatal failure for the module.

onDojoLoad

void onDojoLoad()
This method executes the Java instrcutions or JavaScript (with JSNI ). This should be called after that the scripts JavaScript needed for the widget Dojo are loaded. It's not necessary to implement this method every time it depends of the widget Dojo to integrate.

getDojoName

java.lang.String getDojoName()
Returns the name of the dojo widget example : FisheyeList This method is used to load the scripts JavaScript for Dojo and create the dojo widget. See the Dojo documentation to know the good name.

Returns:
the name of dojo widget

doAfterCreation

void doAfterCreation()
Do something after that the widget Dojo is created. Don't use directly this method, use a Dojo controller instead : DojoController

doBeforeDestruction

void doBeforeDestruction()
Do something before the desctruction of the Dojo widget, use this method to free some memory tp prevent memory leak. Don't use directly this method, use a Dojo controller instead : DojoController

free

void free()
Free,turn to null the resource taken by the Dojo widget in the GWT widget. Don't use directly this method, use a Dojo controller instead : DojoController
